detaileddescription.para: CoolBoard::CoolBoard(): This Constructor is provided to start the I2C interface and Init the different used pins
CoolBoard::begin(): This method is provided to configure and start the used CoolKit Parts. It also starts the first connection try If Serial is enabled,it prints the configuration of the used parts.

CoolBoard::config(): This method is provided to configure the CoolBoard : -log interval -irene3000 activated/deactivated -jetpack activated/deactivated -external Sensors activated/deactivated -mqtt server timeout

simplesect.para: true if configuration is done, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: CoolBoard::update(mqtt answer): This method is provided to handle the configuration update of the different parts

CoolBoard::offlineMode(): This method is provided to manage the offLine mode: -read sensors -do actions -save data in the file system -if there is WiFi but no Internet : make data available over AP -if there is no connection : retry to connect
CoolBoard::onLineMode(): This method is provided to manage the online mode: -update clock -read sensor -do actions -publish data -read answer -update config
CoolBoard::connect(): This method is provided to manage the network connection and the mqtt connection.
This method is provided to check if the card is connected to Wifi and MQTT

simplesect.para: 0 : connected -1: Wifi Not Connected -2: MQTT Not Connected

detaileddescription.para: CoolBoard::getLogInterval(): This method is provided to get the log interval
CoolBoard::printConf(): This method is provided to print the configuration to the Serial Monitor.
CoolBoard::sleep(int interval): This method is provided to allow the board to enter deepSleep mode for a period of time equal to interval in s
CoolBoard::readSensors(): This method is provided to read and format all the sensors data in a single json.

simplesect.para: json string of all the sensors read.

detaileddescription.para: CoolBoard::initReadI2C(): This method is provided to enable the I2C Interface.
CoolBoard::userData(): This method is provided to return the user's data.

simplesect.para: json string of the user's data

briefdescription.para: This class manages the CoolBoard and all of Its functions.
